start: Did you hear about Jim and Steve last night?
Jim went crazy and clobbered Steve to death before jumping out the window!
I know, it's terrible! I'm stuck with all their work, and I don't even get paid overtime!
Oh, yeah and I guess their deaths were sad too...
This will be like shooting fish in a barrel.
I am concerned about the ethical ramifications of this.
What you should be concerned with is the fact that they're not all on the same floor.
You're going to have to jump from body to body.
Hop to! You've only got 60 seconds before your next payment's due.
end: You're actually saving me a lot of paperwork by paying off your debt instead of just defaulting, you know.
Oh goodie, I'm helping out an undead tax collector.
